commitThreshold(bytes32).notice: Commit hash(threshold, nonce) for the next round.

reveal(uint256,uint256).notice: Reveal a threshold for the subsequent round.

reveal(uint8,bytes32).notice: Reveal side & salt during the reveal window.

settle().notice: Anyone may call once the reveal window has elapsed.

sweepDust(uint256).notice: Sweep accumulated dust after settlement and long inactivity.
